name: Telegram-WhatsApp Bridge Bot
description: Bridge bot to forward messages from Telegram to WhatsApp

MONGODB_URI.description: MongoDB connection URI (Get from MongoDB Atlas - mongodb+srv://username:password@cluster.mongodb.net/dbname)

ADMIN_IDS.description: Comma-separated Telegram user IDs for admin access (optional)

DEFAULT_TARGET.description: Default WhatsApp target number in international format (e.g., 923001234567)
